name: Sadat Nazari
story: Hasib Zahor grew up in a small village in Iran. He joined the military as soon as he turned 18, hoping to make a difference in his country. He quickly rose through the ranks due to his natural leadership qualities and hard work. Hasib is a dedicated Muslim, and his faith gives him strength in the toughest of times. He is fiercely loyal to his men and will do anything to protect them.
